verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump ’s trade adviser] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [V: blamed] [ARG1: Canada] [ARG2: for the failure to finalize a reboot of the North American Free Trade Agreement after months of negotiations] .
Donald Trump ’s trade adviser on Sunday blamed Canada for the failure to [V: finalize] [ARG1: a reboot of the North American Free Trade Agreement] [ARGM-TMP: after months of negotiations] .
